column2: Trains on the Up Main crossing to any throughplatform other than platform 4 at Preston orrouted to the Up Goods or Up Through
Trains from the Up and Down Goods
No allowance should be inserted between Preston Fylde Junction and Preston into any trains because there areno intermediate signals in the Up direction.
NW1002 PENKRIDGE STATION (INCLUSIVE) TO TRENT VALLEY JN NO.1(STAFFORD)
Refer to route NW1001 Armitage Jn (inclusive) to Preston Fylde Jn
NW1007 NANTWICH (EXCLUSIVE) TO CREWE SOUTH JN

There is no direct route between Gresty Lane Jn and Basford Hall Jn without going through Crewe Basford HallYard (Freightliner). Non-Freightliner services require prior agreement between the operator and Freightliner beforebeing routed via the yard.
NW1009 BASFORD HALL JN TO SANDBACH SOUTH JN (INDEPENDENT LINES)
Refer to route NW1001 Armitage Jn (inclusive) to Preston Fylde Jn
Up Independent Line between Signals BH60 and NH43/44 is 1019m (159 SLU)
